Does living in Big Cities offer benefits in comparison to rural areas? What can be done to minimize the disparity between rural and urban areas in India?

     Broadly speaking  in present scenario living in big cities is better than living in rural areas .Again when it come to camparison both urban and rural areas have their own advantages and disavantages.Y, Today people say big cities is better than rural because we  have more advanced facilities in big cities like hospitality ,education system and main cause is employment opportunities for the qualified people .  In big cities we find people from many places and their wont be any dicremination among them.

       In the metro cities people find good services and facilities where rural areas they wont be easily accessiable to any facility and education system is advanced in big cities , Now a days all parents wants their child not only to be educated but their  child should be qualified with an outsatinding qualification then they get only in big cities.

    finally to minimize the disparity between rural and urban area in india, people in rural area requires minimum education  and also government shoud provide facilities in rural areas, and people mind set should be broadened to minimise this disparity between big cities and rural areas  each and every citizen of our india should always say WE not I Primarily our governmant . Last but not least minimization of disparity is possible only by co - operation and co - ordination , of the people , by the people  and  for the people  which is called democracy , unity in integrity is required.
